title: Highway Rider v1.8.1 mod apk
description:
Highway Rider v1.8.1

In Highway Rider, being daring and passing close to cars and trucks in your motorcycle increases your speed and your score. Be careful with your maneuvering though, crashing into cars hurts! Collect pictures and videos of your crashes. Customize your rider and motorcycle to give them your style!

> 7 Characters with various Motorcycles to Collect
> Online Head-to-head Racing
> Share Replays of your Crashes
> Use Boosts to go Very Fast!
> Complete In-Game Challenges
> Customize your Motorcycles and Outfits in the Shop
> 4 Different city highways
> Evade the police in Fugitive mode!

The best traffic racing game on the store! Speed junkies, slap on your helmet and experience some high-octane racing! Zoom down the open highways and try to pass closely without crashing. Be stupidly irresponsible by breaking all your bones.

========> INSTRUCTIONS <==========
- Tilt to Steer your Motorcycle
- Drive Close to Cars and Trucks to Score
- Embrace the High Speeds!

What's new:
> Denser and more difficult traffic!
> Removed Unnecessary Permissions
> Multiplayer invites are now much improved!
> All-New Birdseye Camera
> Added ability to get 2 boosts by watching a video

Hacks:
- Unlimited gas caps.
- Unlimited boost tanks.

Requirements: Android: 2.2 and up
